import json

# CLASSES ======================================================================


[docs]class Probe():
	'''Probe class'''

	def __init__(self, **kwargs):
		'''Constructor method.'''

		self.seq = seq

		# Close
		return


[docs]	def to_json(self, stringify = False):
		'''Serializes current istance to JSON.'''

		data = {}
		data['seq'] = self.seq

		if stringify:
			return(json.dumps(data))
		else:
			return(data)



[docs]class ProbeList():
	'''ProbeList class'''

	def __init__(self, from_json = None):
		'''Constructor method.

		Args:
			from_json (list): list from json.load().
		'''

		self.probes = []
		if not type(None) == type(from_json):
			[self.probes.append(Probe(**from_json)) for p in from_json]

		# Close
		return


[docs]	def to_json(self, stringify = False):
		'''Serializes current istance to JSON.'''

		data = [p.to_json() for p in self.probes]

		if stringify:
			return(json.dumps(data))
		else:
			return(data)


# END ==========================================================================
